item.title: CYCLO: Cyclic Graph Transformer Approach to Multi-Object Relationship Modeling in Aerial Videos
item.description: CYCLO: A novel cyclic graph transformer excels at multi-object relationship modeling in aerial videos.

item.title: DINTR: Tracking via Diffusion-based Interpolation
item.description: DINTR: A novel diffusion-based object tracker surpasses existing methods by using efficient interpolation, achieving superior performance across diverse benchmarks.

item.title: EAGLE: Efficient Adaptive Geometry-based Learning in Cross-view Understanding
item.description: EAGLE: A novel unsupervised cross-view adaptation method for semantic segmentation achieves state-of-the-art performance by efficiently modeling geometric structural changes across different camera vi…
